comments.comment: Miyamai niyamai.apita mehema simhalayo innawa.loku haiyak.api okkoma oyalath ekkama innawa uparima dahayogaya denawa okun thunfenama eliyata danakalma demu gema balapiya thambiya sinhalayage haiya thope salliwalata yata wenne naha.mathi amathiwaru owunge asuchi kanawa.api wata karamu parliment eka.balapiya sinhalaya eliyata bajuwama thiyrna shakthiya.puluwannam thopi piriminam rliyata bahapan hangila idahena okkoma karanne.thopi apen kala apitwama pawa denawa thambinta oya thambi parayomge voce cut apita epa.meka ape rata simhalayage rata.hamuduruwanta karadarayak umoth api okkoma bahinawa parata.thopita me para thama padamak ugannanne.ubalawa araksaha karanna inne polisiyai hamudawaine.eyalath nathi unadawasata arakshawa ballata giya dawasak enawa eka wadi athaka naha.
